hire me if:


you’re out of ideas
you have a lot of ideas, but aren’t sure of how to make them work
you want to test & implement new stuff

your solution is fun, but it isn’t working
you have working solutions, but they aren’t fun

you are beginning a new project
you want to make sense of a chaotic project

you don’t connect with your current user base
you want to connect with new users

you want to make concrete plans for the future of your project

you identified a problem, but have no solution for it
you have a solution, but aren’t sure of what’s the problem
you want to reframe issues within your proyect (i.e. finding new areas of opportunity)
